sentence.Network_en: This little twerp's the one who messed up your beautiful face?

sentence.Network_en: That malfunctioning little twerp. This is all his fault!

entry.def: If you call someone a twerp, you are insulting them and saying that they are silly or stupid.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who is regarded as contemptible

auth_sentence.content: That man is the most insufferable little twerp.
auth_sentence.res_content: That man is the most insufferable little twerp.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That man is the most insufferable little twerp.
